remarks: The "natural map" from words of the free monoid to their cosets in the free group is a surjective monoid homomorphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
statement:
frgpmhm.m $e |- M = ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) $.
frgpmhm.w $e |- W = ( Base ` M ) $.

frgpmhm.f $e |- F = ( x e. W |-> [ x ] .~ ) $.
frgpmhm $p |- ( I e. V -> F e. ( M MndHom G ) ) $.

$d G x $.
$d I x $.
